title: Rock Gardening - Reimagining a Classic Style (gnv64)
description: Rock Gardening Reimagining a Classic Style By Joseph Tychonievich Timber Press | November 2016 | ISBN-10: 1604695870 | PDF | 296 Pages | 44.9 mb Rock gardening -the art of growing alpines and other miniature plants in the company of rocks in order to recreate the look of a rugged mountaintop-has been surging in popularity. Time and space constraints, chronic drought in the American West, and a trend toward architectural plants are just a few of the reasons for the increased interest. Rock Gardening brings this traditional style to a new generation of gardeners. It includes a survey of gorgeous rock gardens from around the world, the techniques and methods specific to creating and maintaining a rock garden, and profiles of the top 50 rock garden plants. About the Author https://s2.postimg.org/lxbcrbrhl/Tychonievich.jpg Joseph Tychonievich studied horticulture, plant breeding, and genetics at the Ohio State University and was the nursery manager at Arrowhead Alpines, a premier rock garden nursery in Fowlerville, Michigan. He spent a summer working at Shibamichi Honten Nursery in Japan and has been a repeat guest on public radio's food show The Splendid Table. Starting from the age of five when he asked his parents for seeds for his birthday, Joseph has had a deep and abiding obsession with just about everything photosynthetic, from the vegetable garden to the rock garden. Organic Gardening Magazine called him one of “six young horticulturalists who are helping to shape how America gardens.” CONTENTS 7 Introduction Gardens 15 19 Branklyn Garden 27 Aysgarth Edwardian Rock Garden 35 Ev Whittemore 43 Glenn Shapiro 53 Helen Nelson 61 Phyllis Gustafson 69 Kathy Allen 77 Stella Rankin 85 Michael Riley 91 Cliff Booker Techniques 97 101 Styles and Construction 117 Soil 133 Containers 149 Climate 163 Getting (and Making) More Plants Plants 173 177 Cacti 183 Campanulas 187 Conifers 195 Cyclamen 201 Daphnes 209 Dianthus 215 Drabas 217 Erodiums 221 Gentians 225 Hostas 229 Irises 235 Lewisias 239 Penstemons 243 Polygalas 247 Primulas 253 Pulsatillas 257 Ramondas 261 Saxifrages 267 Sempervivums 273 Tulips 277 Metric Conversions 278 Alpine Resources 279 Further Reading 280 Acknowledgments 281 Photography Credits 282 Index https://s2.postimg.org/nnudst90p/Rock_Gardening_-_Reimagining_a_Classic_Style.jpg
